sys_script_client.description:
### **Functionality Overview:** This client script executes when the `u_status` field changes. It dynamically updates the visibility and mandatory status of reason fields based on the selected status.
1. **Reset All Reason Fields** – Initially, all reason fields are hidden and set to non-mandatory. 2. **Determine the Relevant Field** – A mapping (`statusMap`) links each `u_status` value to its corresponding reason field. 3. **Update the Correct Field** – If a match is found, the relevant field is displayed and set as mandatory, ensuring only the appropriate reason field is visible based on the selected status.
sys_script_client.name: PopulateVictimDetailsOnEmailChange2
